explains: v. 使着迷；使心神不宁；挂牵，念念不忘

sentences.en: To do this successfully, their brain prompts them to think and even obsess about others.
sentences.cn: 为了成功地做到这一点，他们的大脑会促使他们去思考，甚至沉迷于他人。

sentences.en: The project seems to obsess him.
sentences.cn: 这项工程似乎令他着迷。

sentences.en: Don't obsess over the details yet.
